description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9f8h7","text":"Protocol to differentiate neural progenitor cells to mature neurons and astrocytes in 2D culture. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

related_materials.name: Corning® Matrigel® Basement Membrane Matrix, LDEV-free, 10 mL

entries.section: Passaging NPCs (every 6-7 days - volumes listed at for 1w of a 6w plate)

related_materials.name: Corning® Matrigel® Basement Membrane Matrix, Phenol Red-free, LDEV-free, 10 mL

entries.section: Passaging NPCs (every 6-7 days - volumes listed at for 1w of a 6w plate)

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"79i7","text":"See protocol for thawing hematopoietic progenitor cells (HPCs).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjvmo","text":"     https://www.protocols.io/view/thawing-frozen-hematopoietic-stem-cells-hpcs-dddt226n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2b83h","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"81jhg","text":"It is the same procedure for NPCs, except:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":42}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"263vk","text":"the plates are coated with 0.5 mg/mL standard matrigel","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":27,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jcvo","text":"the cells are maintained in NPC base +EGF+FGF+10uM ROCKi (ROCKi is removed 24hr after thawing) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50u8s","text":"the cells are plated at 250-300K/well in a 6w plate","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"56q6n","text":"d1 after passaging NPCs (see STEP 3)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hvos","text":"Perform a full media change and replace with NPC maintenance media without ROCKi (NPC base +EGF+FGF)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gtcg","text":"          NPC+EGF+FGF (10mL):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":10,"length":19},{"style":"bold","offset":10,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bont8","text":"          10mL NPC base media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3oklp","text":"          1uL    20ng/mL EGF (stock 200ug/mL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9vnts","text":"          2uL    20ng/mL FGF (stock 100ug/mL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ofo6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fn1up","text":"d3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7g6s","text":"Perform a half media change. Remove 900uL/well, and add a fresh 1mL/well NPC base +EGF+FGF. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5uto9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfsem","text":"d5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c3kad","text":"Perform a half media change. Remove 900uL/well, and add a fresh 1mL/well NPC base +EGF+FGF.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fdap8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5i8ke","text":"d6-7","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5tvk6","text":"Passage to new dishes coated with 0.5mg/mL standard matrigel in NPC base +EGF+FGF. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3t00j","text":"        for 6w plates -\u003e 1 million cells/well in 2mL NPC base +EGF+FGF","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6htu5","text":"        for 5cm cellBIND dishes -\u003e 2.4 million cells/dish in 6mL NPC base +EGF+FGF","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5fea8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"637v","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"385dl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bcvvq","text":"The high plating density is important, the cells need to be very dense to maintain progenitor identity. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"69rve","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2de26","text":"I've stains the cells after maintaining in +EGF+FGF at high density up to 5x passages after thawing and \u003e 90% of the cells remain PAX6+SOX2+NESTIN+. If passaged at lower density, the cells will stop dividing and/or differentiate. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"0BBF1EA3D57F49A0A4AB4A49080DB0E3"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9c5tm","text":"d1 after passaging NPCs (see STEP 3)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ch25k","text":"Perform a full media change and replace with neuron differentiation media (NPC base +BDNF+GDNF+cAMP)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bsugh","text":"          NPC+BDNF+GDNF+cAMP (10mL):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":10,"length":26},{"style":"bold","offset":10,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ctbbu","text":"          10mL NPC base media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f549b","text":"          1uL    20 ng/mL BDNF (stock 200 ug/mL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1pp7r","text":"\t  2uL   20 ng/mL GDNF (stock 100 ug/mL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7i9ka","text":"\t  1uL    1 uM cAMP (stock 10mM)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"damj3","text":"d3 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3l371","text":"Perform a half media change. Remove 900uL/well, add a fresh 1mL/well NPC base +BDNF+GDNF+cAMP. Remove 900uL/well, add a fresh 1mL/well NPC base +BDNF+GDNF+cAMP.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3edbb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"265ff","text":"d7 [differentiation passage 1 - no ROCKi during this step]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":4,"length":53}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8t8qe","text":"Passage to new dishes coated with 0.5mg/mL standard matrigel in NPC base +BDNF+GDNF+cAMP. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fbsu1","text":"        for 6w plates -\u003e 1 million cells/well in 2mL media ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"696bf","text":"        for 5cm cellBIND -\u003e 2.4 million cells/dish in 6mL media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2i1lc","text":"        for 10cm cellBIND dishes -\u003e 5.8 million cells/dish in 12mL media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bfrbm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1e5r8","text":"d9","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5irk3","text":"Perform a full media change and replace with neuron differentiation media (NPC base +BDNF+GDNF+cAMP) to remove any dead cells. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ihfr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c535s","text":"d11","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9bq4h","text":"Perform a half media change. Remove 900uL/well, add a fresh 1mL/well NPC base +BDNF+GDNF+cAMP. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4ite","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jpik","text":"d13 [differentiation passage 2 - no ROCKi during this step]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":5,"length":53}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"tegn","text":"Passage to new dishes coated with 0.5mg/mL standard matrigel in NPC base +BDNF+GDNF+cAMP. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e245o","text":"        for 6w plates -\u003e 400K cells/well in 2mL media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fg724","text":"        for 5cm cellBIND -\u003e 1 million cells/dish in 6mL media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"iia2","text":"        for 10cm cellBIND dishes -\u003e 2.5 million cells/dish in 12mL media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a87fs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4btji","text":"d16+","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4g0qb","text":"Perform a half media change every 3-4 days until 90-95% confluent. When the cells are 90-95% confluent, passage at the same density as d13 and continue with half media changes every 3-4 days until 90-95% confluent again. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"av060","text":"        for 5cm cellBIND -\u003e remove ~2-2.5mL (depending how much media evaporated, leave enough media ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"agd2b","text":"            to cover the bottom), and add a fresh 3mL/well NPC base +BDNF+GDNF+cAMP. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ftoga","text":"        for 10cm cellBIND -\u003e remove ~4.5-5mL (depending how much media evaporated, leave enough media ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"151c8","text":"            to cover the bottom), and add a fresh 6mL/well NPC base +BDNF+GDNF+cAMP. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cc746","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fsesp","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fvadc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85gou","text":"~d42","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1dqqm","text":"To enrich for neurons, around d42 (or close to this date when the dishes are 95% confluent again), treat the cells with 5ug/mL Mitomycin C for 1hour at 37C. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmmjt","text":"After 1hr, perform 3x washes with 6mL PBS, and then replace with 6mL (5cm dishes) or 12mL (10cm dish) of fresh NPC base +BDNF+GDNF+cAMP. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2l5bl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24kir","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"egkcr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d8lto","text":"Seeding at the lower density and feeding the cells less often (every 4 days) results in more progenitor differentiation, plan to have around the number of dishes you want to end with after the 2nd differentiation passage.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"C24C98DD104346478E746D1C63B5A8F0"}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9dni0","text":"If the cells were ~95% confluent before Mitomycin C treatment, 1x 10cm typically yields around 3-6 million cells. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"mjq1","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2mn1v","text":"Continue performing half media changes until used for experiments. After Mitomycin C treatment, the cells should not expand further, so they likely won't need to be passaged again until plating for experiments. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cjfhf","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":47,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"d7td","text":"I've been using these for experiments ~d60-100. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"ECA96F8C89D840B9A03045917C8D0A42"}}}}

","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bsh07","text":"        for 6w plates -\u003e 1 million cells/well in 2mL media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cs68r","text":"        for 5cm cellBIND -\u003e 2.4 million cells/dish in 6mL media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cvaug","text":"        for 10cm cellBIND dishes -\u003e 5.8 million cells/dish in 12mL media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bmu1t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddnou","text":"~d9","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"emael","text":"Perform a full media change and replace with neuron differentiation media (NPC base +hLIF+EGF) to remove any dead cells. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f12","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b02tl","text":"~d13-14 [differentiation passage 2 - no ROCKi during this step]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":9,"length":53}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9q1vg","text":"Passage to new dishes coated with 0.5mg/mL standard matrigel in NPC base +hLIF+CNTF.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":64,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fh6ut","text":"        for 6w plates -\u003e 400K cells/well in 2mL media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6bnp6","text":"        for 5cm cellBIND -\u003e 1 million cells/dish in 6mL media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dqr8m","text":"        for 10cm cellBIND dishes -\u003e 2.5 million cells/dish in 12mL media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"be5ce","text":"          NPC+hLIF+CNTF (10mL):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":10,"length":21},{"style":"bold","offset":10,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jsrv","text":"          10mL NPC base media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d76kg","text":"          1uL    10 ng/mL hLIF (stock 100 ug/mL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eqc7g","text":"\t  1uL    10 ng/mL CNTF (stock 100 ug/mL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cho58","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9pcj8","text":"~d16+","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qqn0","text":"Perform a half media change every 3-4 days with NPC base +hLIF+CNTF until 95-100% confluent. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":48,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6bbmb","text":"When the cells are 95-100% confluent, passage at the same density as ~d13 and continue with half media changes with NPC base +hLIF+CNTF every 3-4 days until 95-100% confluent again. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":116,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3t19v","text":"        for 5cm cellBIND -\u003e remove ~2-2.5mL (depending how much media evaporated, leave enough media ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1nm1","text":"            to cover the bottom), and add a fresh 3mL/well NPC base +hLIF+CNTF.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":59,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eguq6","text":"        for 10cm cellBIND -\u003e remove ~4.5-5mL (depending how much media evaporated, leave enough media ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rmt8","text":"            to cover the bottom), and add a fresh 6mL/well NPC base +hLIF+CNTF. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":59,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bo927","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fnmcp","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9qcun","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6036s","text":"If the cells were ~95% confluent before passaging, 1x 10cm typically yields around 9-14 million cells.  ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9ph4r","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6uv9h","text":"The cells will expand slower with each passage, avoid passaging until 95-100% confluent. Continue performing half media changes until used for experiments, around d50-60 astrocytes with more complex branching should appear and increase in number. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8fqa4","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":48,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"6nv41","text":"I've been using these for experiments ~d60-100. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3qb1i","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":175,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"bh217","text":"After replating for experiments or if maintained past d100, I change the media to NPC +BDNF+GDNF+cAMP to prevent the astrocytes from overgrowing and detaching from the plate. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"689A110278164F03AE3EE3C1F3C511B5"}}}}

steps.section: Passaging NPCs (every 6-7 days - volumes listed at for 1w of a 6w plate)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d35kh","text":"Lift the cells with Accutase.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"64f3l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8mtl2","text":"Aspirate the media.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cas6","text":"Wash with 2mL/well PBS (without Ca/Mg).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6nvkt","text":"Aspirate the PBS.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"k9p9","text":"Add 1mL/well Accutase.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7fpck","text":"Incubate 5 minutes at 37C.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a42sb","text":"Pick up the cells in accutase with a glass pipette and blow the cells off the dish.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bi0v9","text":"Transfer the cells to a 15mL conical tube.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"babld","text":"Add 6mL NPC base media to the dish and blow the remaining cells off the dish.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"sc43","text":"Transfer the remaining cells to the 15mL conical tube.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"62ver","text":"Pipette up/down 3-5x in the conical tube to break apart clumps. To break apart clumps, pipette the cells up, and then press the pipette against the side of the tube and blow out quickly. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9r9fr","text":"Pick up the entire cell mixture and filter through a 100um cell strainer over a 50mL conical tube to remove any remaining large clumps.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d14qd","text":"Transfer the cell mixture back to the 15mL conical tube.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f8ikq","text":"Centrifuge at 180g for 5 minutes room temperature.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aldbe","text":"Aspirate the media.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drbpv","text":"Close the conical tube lid and tap the pellet to loosen the cell pellet.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"etn1g","text":"Resuspend in 2-3mL of NPC base media.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"es9fu","text":"Pipette up/down 3-5x or until the cell solution is cloudy. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
